Package com.example.database

Class Database

java.lang.Object
com.example.database.Database
public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
A database handling class. Connects and disconnects to the DB, creates table if it does not exist and retrieves data.

  • Method Details

    • connect

      public void connect​(java.lang.String path)
      Connect to the database
      Parameters:
      path - specify the path of db

    • disconnect

      public void disconnect()
      Disconnect to database

    • createTable

      public void createTable()
      Create a new table if not exist

    • addInfo

      public java.lang.String addInfo​(BuildInfo info)
      Add a build info to the database
      Parameters:
      info - BuildInfo, combines the commit identifier and build time from PushEvent.headCommit and logs from OutputStream
      Returns:
      if successful the unique identifier of commit to be used for further refer, otherwise empty string

    • getOneInfo

      public BuildInfo getOneInfo​(java.lang.String commit_id)
      Return one build info based on the unique key returned when insert it
      Parameters:
      commit_id - unique identifier of commit used to get the build info
      Returns:
      BuildInfo object includes build information (commit identifier, build date, build logs) if successful get info, otherwise null

    • getAllInfo

      public java.util.ArrayList<BuildInfo> getAllInfo()
      Return a list of all the build information
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of BuildInfo objects if successful, otherwise null
